tgt_original: evaṃ triṃśaddinānyeko māsaḥ |  dvādaśamāsā ekaṃ varṣaṃ |  varṣāṇāṃ sahasraṃ kālasūtranarakasyāyuḥ ||  9 | punaḥ khalu dva mānuṣavarṣaśate yāmadevānāmahorātraṃ |

src_original: yai rātridivasā anumīyanta iti//  338.001. <338>tataḥ ṣoḍaśa nimeṣā ekā kāṣṭhā/  338.001. ṣoḍaśa kāṣṭhā ekā kalā/
tgt_original: dvādaśamāsā ekaṃ varṣaṃ |  catvāri divyavarṣasahasrāṇi tuṣitadevānāmāyuḥ |

etad rauravanarakasyāhorātram |  evaṃ triṃśad dinānyeko māsaḥ |  evaṃ triṃśad dinānyeko māsaḥ |  dvādaśamāsā ekaṃ varṣaṃ |  tadetad gaṇanayā mānuṣāṇāṃ triṃśadadhikadve varṣakoṭiśate catvāriṃśad varṣaśatasahasrāṇi ||  etad mahārauravanarakasyāhorātraṃ |  aṣṭau varṣasahasrāṇi mahārauravanarakasyāyuḥ ||

dvādaśamāsā ekaṃ varṣaṃ |  ṣoḍaśadivyavarṣasahasrāṇi paranirmitavaśavartidevānāmāyuḥ |  tadetad gaṇanayā ekaviṃśatyadhikanavavarṣakoṭiśatāni ṣaṣṭi ca varṣaśatasahrāṇi ||  etat tapananarakasyāhorātraṃ |  evaṃ triṃśad dinānyeko māsaḥ |
